ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 15 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> There HAS to be a penatlty for dying! They already reduced the experience
> loss twice. I for one would prefer a lower experience loss than to be able
> to bind, and get back to my corpse a lot faster with a lot less experience
> than before i died. i guarantee it will take you longer to regain the exp
> you lose if they left it as before, then to run to your corpse.

I happen to agree with you, but time spent gaining back lost
experience is time playing the game. Running back to your
corpse most people consider worthless downtime. While a lower
experience loss may result in reaching level 50 more quickly,
long runs to your corpse decrease the percentage of your
/played time that is spent actually playing the game (fighting
monsters).

--
John H. Kim
